batchClaim(uint256,(uint256,address,uint.details: Batch claim tokens for multiple wallets using Merkle proofs

params.batchId: The batch ID containing the orders
params.claims: Array of claim data for each wallet

claim(uint256,uint256,address,uint256,ui.details: Claim tokens using a Merkle proof for a BridgeOut order

params.batchId: The batch ID containing the order
params.merkleProof: The Merkle proof for the order

deposit(uint256,uint256,bytes32).details: Deposit tokens to trigger a BridgeIn order

params.bankingHash: Hash of the banking transfer information (account details, reference, etc.)

emergencyWithdraw(uint256,address,uint25.details: Emergency function to withdraw tokens (MVP only)

getSupportedToken(uint256).details: Get the token address for a given token ID

getTokenBalance(uint256).details: Get the contract balance for a specific token

returns._0: The token balance of this contract

isClaimed(uint256).details: Check if an order has been claimed

isTokenSupported(uint256).details: Check if a token ID is supported
